
.. _user:


####################
PyMegara User Guide
####################

This guide is intended as an introductory overview of PyMegara and
explains how to install and make use of the most important features of
PyMegara. For detailed reference documentation of the functions and
classes contained in the package, see the :ref:`reference`.

.. warning::

   This "User Guide" is still a work in progress; some of the material
   is not organized, and several aspects of PyMegara are not yet covered
   sufficient detail.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   intro
